meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>car</kanji> <kanji>ring</kanji>s are what part of your car? Those are your tires. So, a car ring is a <vocabulary>tire</vocabulary>. This can also mean <vocabulary>car wheel</vocabulary>, or the <vocabulary>wheel</vocabulary> of some other vehicle.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
